sentences.english: Different irrigation maximums also influenced plant significantly at blooming and fruit-bearing stage.
sentences.chinese: 不同灌水上限对开花结果期也有显著影响。

sentences.english: Life without love like a tree without bloom or fruit.
sentences.chinese: 欠缺爱的生命，就像未开花结果的枯树。

sentences.english: Pistil is the seed-producing part of the flower.
sentences.chinese: 雌蕊是花结种的一部分。

sentences.english: Ginkgo biloba is a strong spur the flowering parts.
sentences.chinese: 短枝是银杏开花结实的部位。

sentences.english: These flowers have gone to seed.
Our years of effort has finally borne fruit now.
sentences.chinese: 我们多年的努力现在终于开花结果了。

sentences.english: Flowering period should be few irrigation fertilization.
sentences.chinese: 开花结果期宜少灌水施肥。

sentences.english: Life without loves is like a tree without blossoms or fruits.
sentences.chinese: 缺少爱的生命，就象从未开花结果的枯树。

sentences.english: Eupatorium odoratum could not flower normally when illumination was less than 38%.
sentences.chinese: 飞机草在光照率38%以下不能正常开花结果。

sentences.english: Regardless of ability tob fruit, like is feeling happy.
sentences.chinese: 不管能否开花结果，喜欢一个人的感觉都是愉快的。

sentences.english: Life without love like a tree without blossom or fruit.
sentences.chinese: 缺少爱的生命，就像未开花结果的枯树。

sentences.english: She tied a pretty knot at the end of her pigtails.
sentences.chinese: 她在辫子的末梢打了一个花结。

sentences.english: Shi sufficient fertilizer, flowering period should be few irrigation fertilization.
sentences.chinese: 施足有机肥，开花结果期宜少灌水施肥。

sentences.english: To be mature, then love will be abloom and fruitful.
sentences.chinese: 人成熟一点，妳的爱情便会开花结果。

sentences.english: And it's getting even harder tryin' 2 feed &water my seed plus.
sentences.chinese: 种子要开花结果就要更加辛勤的浇水施肥。

sentences.english: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms orfruite.
